text: Growth means an increase in some quantity over time. The quantity can be physical (e.g., growth in height, growth in an amount of money) or abstract (e.g., a system becoming more complex, an organism becoming more mature). It can also refer to the mode of growth, i.e. numeric models for describing how much a particular quantity grows over time: * Cell growth * Individual growth ** Fungal growth ** Auxology (Human development) *** Human development (biology) **** Growth "spurt" (rapid change in puberty) *** Human development (psychology) * Population growth ** Bacterial growth * Tumours can sometimes be referred to as a growth * Growth hormone * Economic growth * For financial growth due to simple interest or compound interest see Interest * Personal growth, i.e., Personal development *Mode ** Linear growth ** Logistic growth ** Exponential growth Category:Basic English 850 words
title: Growth
